Container.Name: tasmocompiler
Container.Overview: TasmoCompiler is a simple web GUI which allows you to compile fantastic Tasmota firmware with your own settings **IMPORTANT NOTE** You have to remember that all compilation is performed on Gitpod servers, so you have to decide if you want to put sensitive data like Wifi/MQTT credentials to Gitpod hands.
Container.Description: TasmoCompiler is a simple web GUI which allows you to compile fantastic Tasmota firmware with your own settings **IMPORTANT NOTE** You have to remember that all compilation is performed on Gitpod servers, so you have to decide if you want to put sensitive data like Wifi/MQTT credentials to Gitpod hands.
